description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Suspension of advance ticket sales for selected train trips
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 個別列車車次暫停預售

2025-10-18T18:02:00.CONTENT_EN: As informed by the Chinese Mainland Railway Authorities, advance ticket sales for the following train trips will be suspended: From Hong Kong West Kowloon Station to Guangzhounan Station • From 1 Nov and onwards: G6582, G6536, G6508, G6538, G6588, G6505, G6527, G6583, G6537, G6585, G6509 From Zhaoqingdong Station to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station • From 1 Nov and onwards: G6579 For the latest advance ticket sales arrangements, please refer to the 12306 official website (12306. cn) and mobile app, High Speed Rail website and mobile app.
2025-10-18T18:02:00.CONTENT_CN: 中國內地鐵路單位通知，以下列車車次會暫停預售： 來往香港西九龍站及廣州南站 •11月1日及以後：G6582,G6536,G6508,G6538,G6588,G6505,G6527,G6583,G6537,G6585,G6509 由肇慶東站前往香港西九龍站 •11月1日及以後：G6579 有關最新預售安排，請留意12306官方網站(12306.cn)及手機應用程式、高速鐵路網頁及手機應用程式。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Car Parks at West Kowloon Cultural District

2025-10-19T16:21:00.CONTENT_EN: All car parks at West Kowloon Cultural District are full. Members of the public are encouraged to take public transport to the West Kowloon Cultural District.
2025-10-19T16:21:00.CONTENT_CN: 西九文化區內所有停車場現已泊滿車輛，前往西九文化區一帶的市民請使用公共交通工具。

2025-10-20T17:20:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to hoisting of Strong Wind Signal No. 3 and the associated wet weather, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. pay attention to the special traffic and transport arrangements may be implemented; ii. pay attention to the possible traffic congestions of the roads; iii. plan the journey in advance; iv. allow more traveling time to cater for delay; v. drive with extra care and patience; and vi. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-10-20T17:20:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於三號強風信號現正生效、天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.留意當局可能會實施特別的交通及運輸措施； ii.留意在個別道路可能會出現交通擠塞的情況； iii.提早計劃行程路線； iv.預留充裕時間出門； v.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 vi.特别留意視線受阻的交通繁忙路口。

2025-10-20T17:58:00.CONTENT_EN:
Due to tropical cyclone, the following ferry/ kaito ferry services will be or have been adjusted:

Fortune Ferry Company Limited
‘Tuen Mun – Tung Chung – Sha Lo Wan – Tai O’ Route:
- Tuen Mun to Tai O: Last sailing at 5 p. m. 
- Tai O to Tuen Mun: Last sailing at 6 p. m.
2025-10-20T17:58:00.CONTENT_CN:
受熱帶氣旋影響，以下渡輪/街渡服務將會或已經作出調整：

富裕小輪有限公司
「屯門-東涌-沙螺灣-大澳」航線：
-屯門至大澳：尾班船於下午5時開出
-大澳至屯門：尾班船於下午6時開出。

2025-10-20T20:42:00.CONTENT_EN:
Due to tropical cyclone, the following ferry/ kaito ferry services have been adjusted:

Fortune Ferry Company Limited
‘Tuen Mun – Tung Chung – Sha Lo Wan – Tai O’ Route:
- Tuen Mun to Tai O: Service suspended
- Tai O to Tuen Mun: Service suspended.
2025-10-20T20:42:00.CONTENT_CN:
受熱帶氣旋影響，以下渡輪/街渡服務已經作出調整：

富裕小輪有限公司
「屯門-東涌-沙螺灣-大澳」航線：
-屯門至大澳：暫停服務
-大澳至屯門：暫停服務。
